name: Banana for Scale - Mobile AR Prototype
name_original: Banana for Scale - Mobile AR Prototype
description:
Banana for scale is a mobile AR game that you play by pointing your phone at our business cards or brand image (like that one at the top of our itch.io page).

This is an experiment designed to explore using the distance of the camera as the main game input. It's pretty cool!

How to play:

  • Open the app and point your phone at the Fiero logo, it works best on one of our business cards :)
  • Move your camera in and out until you think that the banana is the correct scale compared to the other object, then tap the screen to lock in your guess.
